name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in designing and delivering high-performance applications. Proficient in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **AWS**, with a strong foundation in **Java** and **Spring Boot**. Expertise in leveraging **MongoDB** for database management and building robust APIs using **API Gateway** and **Lambda** functions. Skilled in collaboration and problem-solving, ensuring seamless integration and delivery of projects.
Demonstrated ability in developing AI/ML-powered platforms, utilizing skills in **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for frontend development and **FastAPI** and **Django** for backend solutions. Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems using services such as **S3** and **CDK**. Proven track record of implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
